Middle Georgia residents are welcome.\n\nPantry distribution starts at 3:00pm (while supplies last).", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "207 Papermill Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Gordon", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "31031", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 32.8810547, "longitude": -83.33360479999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(678) 223-3663", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "20:15"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
